This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7

  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1

    9654Preliminary ANC
